name: Lorem Ipsum for WP Editor
tagline: Now you can test you website adding Lorem Ipsum text to your posts using this WordPress plugin
body:
### Installing
It's so easy to use in your website! You just need download and activate :)

### How it works...
When you are creating/editing the post, you can choose how many paragraphs you want to add on your text. After choose, the Lorem Ipsum text will be added after the existent text.

### Improvment
Do you want to help us? Fork this and give your skills to get better!

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
